CustomField.description: A simple framing of the strategic goals of working with that partner. Should include some strategic rationale and a clear articulation of the product-market fit for USDC and the use case. Example: Significantly grow USDC distribution in X region by partnering with the region’s top super-app with a reach of 50 million digital-native active users focusing on remittance.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: A simple framing of the strategic goals of working with that partner. Should include some strategic rationale and a clear articulation of the product-market fit for USDC and the use case. Example: Significantly grow USDC distribution in X region by partnering with the region’s top super-app with a reach of 50 million digital-native active users focusing on remittance.
CustomField.label: Objective
